title: Centre Palais des Papes B2 Clim - 123Avignon
description:
Centre Palais des Papes B2 Clim - 123Avignon in Avignon features accommodations with free Wifi, a 11-minute walk from Avignon Central Station, 3.2 miles from Avignon TGV Train Station, and 7 miles from Parc des Expositions Avignon. The property is around 25 miles from Arles Amphitheatre, 30 miles from Parc Expo Nîmes, and a 6-minute walk from Pont d'Avignon. The property is a 5-minute walk from Papal Palace and within 200 yards of the city center.

The apartment is composed of 2 separate bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave and a fridge, and 1 bathroom. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Thouzon's cave is 13 miles from the apartment, while Pont du Gard is 16 miles from the property.

availability.bed_configuration: Bedroom 1: 1 full bed Bedroom 2: 1 twin bed

top_reviews.review:
The apartment was put together with care and creativity.
The air conditioning worked well (98 F outside!)
and the location and the view from the window were priceless. The stairs to the second floor were narrow and steep for the luggage
Well stocked, comfortable, and large by French standards. Great location.
Location, and all the facilities which you almost can find anything in the department! The shower space is limited and the stairs are quite steep and narrow. Suggest not to bring big suitcases.
You couldn’t ask for a better location. Right in the heart of historic Avignon and 100m from the Palais des Pape. A great cafe right outside and options everywhere.
The room is pretty and has a good view. It’s very close to the palais. And it has almost everything we need.

Location was fantastic, right in the centre of the Old Town. A little bit tricky to find but once located it had easy access to everywhere. Train station is an easy 10 minute walk.
View out the window is very pretty and you feel part of the vibrant life.
Very secure and the facilities were fabulous.

Location, the friendliness and communication of Antione and owners (exceptional)
Loved the apartment - kitchen and interior really beautiful Having to leave.

Lovely apartment for two friends. Very clean and comfortable and had everything you could need. Great location,  close to historic area, shops and restaurants. 2nd floor but no problem in accessing.  Host very helpful.

Nice apartment in an unbeatable location in Avignon, set on a picturesque square and close to shops, restaurants, sights, etc. Good amount of space for a longer stay and we enjoyed our time there. The WiFi wasn't super reliable but that was the only thing!

My daughter and I loved staying in this accommodation ! A great location for exploring Avignon.  Very clean and comfortable with a restaurant below and a supermarket nearby for self-catering. An easy walk from the station and very central.

title: ibis Avignon Centre Gare
description:
In the heart of Avignon, Ibis Avignon Center Gare is just 164 feet from the Avignon Train Station. It offers a 24-hour front desk, a bar, free WiFi and newspapers. Parking is available at the paid public parking area of the train station, located at the foot of the hotel.

The air-conditioned hotels rooms have a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a wardrobe. They all offer an private bathroom with a shower. Ironing facilities are also available.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savory dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

There is an à-la-carte restaurant on site and guests can also relax with a drink at the hotel’s bar.

Famous touristic sights like the Palais des Papes or the Pont d’Avignon Saint-Bénezet are within 0.6 mi. Guests can drive 19 mi to The Pont du Gard. Avignon TGV Train Station is 1.9 mi away.

availability.room_type: Standard Double Room with Old Town View

top_reviews.review: Adjacent to train station. Comfy beds. Nice breakfast.

Although the rooms were on the small side, they were clean, quiet, and well-appointed. Comfortable bed, fabulous views of  the old city walls, fabulous breakfast. If I'm ever again in Avignon I'll definitely book a room there! It was a little hard to find the entrance, but after that, no problems at all!

We picked the Ibis location because we planned to go to Pont de Gard aqueduct the next morning, on the bus located next door. The room was clean and the common areas were attractive. People at the desk were helpful and they stored our bags while we were gone. We were very satisfied with our one night stay. The hotel is above the street level and the taxi dropped us about a block away.
Front desk staff were super helpful and super polite, breakfast options were plentyful Cramped and only one towel per person - sure it is a budget hotel but it is still not all that cheap…
We loved how friendly and accommodating the staff were. The breakfast buffet offered so many excellent choices.

The hotel is so close to the station that you can hear station announcements if your window is open! I didn’t mind it but the concrete brutalist architecture and the hotel lobby  has a late 70’s vibe.
next to the in town train station, solid food, extremely helpful staff, very comfortable, great value, could not ask for more. everything was just fine

Jesus, the receptionist, spoke English very well and was very accommodating and welcoming, he offered us free complimentary snacks upon our arrival and helped us check in our bags. Rooms were smaller than expected but they were enough to do the job for one night. Although their direct message to us through booking.com promised a welcome coffee, we had not received it. Construction around the Gare made it inconvenient to park by the hotel entrance and unload, and the parking, once we found it, had no active charging stations for hybrid cars. We had to haul all our 6 luggage pieces into 4 different elevators to get to our room.
Location to train station, front desk staff especially Samantha very helpful & accommodating, bathtub.

Location near the station, cleanliness, very friendly staff. Breakfast was fantastic!
The rooms are small but functional, definitely adequate for a couple of nights. The current construction at the station makes the hotel look uninviting.

title: Régina Boutique Hotel
description:
Régina is a hotel located on the main street in Avignon and just a 5-minute walk from the Palais des Papes.

The rooms are decorated in warm tones and also come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels including Canal+, and a telephone. Free WiFi access is available and some rooms have a balcony. The private bathroom features a bath or shower.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning in the dining room.

Guests can also buy local produce on site, including jams, olive oil and biscuits.

Additional facilities at this hotel include a 24-hour reception and a elevator, which serves most of the rooms. The property is a 10-minute walk from Avignon Train Station.

top_reviews.review: Beautiful and convenient area. Good breakfast. Clean and comfortable. Pleasant staff Difficult to reach by car. No parking. No warning or suggestions in the booking about access. Time consuming and frustrating  to figure out how to get to hotel.

excellent location, 4 blocks from train station, lots of restaurant options. We didn’t try the breakfast ( $15!!) but several good coffee shops nearby. Very helpful staff. Make sure your phone is powered up when you arrive since that is the only way to get into your room. We found that odd…hope it isn’t t  the way of the future.
Location was terrific.  Room was very clean and comfortable. We didn’t have the breakfast because we didn’t want to eat a lot
The location right on one of the main streets in the historic city center was ideal. Although small, the room was tastefully decorated and comfortable. The concierge was also very helpful.
The room was a free upgrade and large. Cleanliness was exceptional. Hallways could use some paint and flooring upgrades.

I had a great room (101, I believe) with a nice view off of the side of the hotel. The air conditioning was excellent considering how hot Avignon was in July. I underestimated when booking the hotel how fantastic the location is, you are really right in the center of Avignon, so it's very safe and there are many food places nearby. I would stay here again. I passed on the breakfast as it didn't look worth the price. I asked if I could just grab a coffee (from the machine), but no. Not a big deal, but I like when hotels are a bit more generous with tea and coffee.

I was very happy with the staff at the front desk. I enjoyed my stay as it is so well located, 10 mn walking straight from the station, next to carrefour supermarket, next to restaurants and the Palais des Papes, very happy and will go back. I’m French but the staff speaks English which is great. I just would have loved to have a safe!
Easy walk from train station and comfortable room. Breakfast nice Digital key was awkward but we eventually figured it out. I get it—everyone uses their phone so put the key on the phone.

Location! A few steps away from the central clock tower / theatre square on the Main Street Rue Republic. Easy to find. Lovely, helpful staff. We were in room 404 which has a wonderful view. Not expensive. Nothing to complain about!

I have visited Avignon before and stayed in different hotels. I will return to this one from now on. The location is perfect, just a few blocks from the main parking lot outside the wall in one direction, and a few blocks from the Gare Centre in another. All of the cultural and historic sites are equally close. This is a gorgeous old hotel (the name is carved in the stone that caps the building) that has been nicely remodeled and updated. The room was the largest of the hotels we stayed in during a month in France. Our room overlooked the tree-lined Rue Viala. Hard to beat! The bathroom could be wider. There wasn't much clearance around the toilet. However, it wasn't the tightest of the rooms I have stayed in.

title: Hôtel Central
description:
Located in the heart of the Old Town of Avignon, Hôtel Central offers comfortable guest rooms with free WiFi internet access. A garden and a bar are available on site.

All of the guest rooms are air-conditioned and have a TV and a private bathroom with bath or shower.

A continental breakfast with fresh fruit, French pastries and hot or cold beverages is available. It can be enjoyed on the flowered terrace in the summer months.

The Central Hotel is a 10-minute walk from the Palais des Papes and the Pont d'Avignon. Avignon Central Station is 1640 feet from the property.

availability.room_type: Small double bedroom - accessible by stairs

availability.bed_configuration: Select your bed (if available) 1 full bed and 1 sofa bed 1 full bed and 2 bunk beds

availability.room_type: Small single room - accessible by stairs

top_reviews.review: Our reception at the hotel was welcoming, and there was a safe place to store our bikes. Our room was large, wifi worked well, and the location was excellent. The elevator was old and a bit wonky, but no big deal at all.

It was located  in a central location. The train station was only a short walk in distance. Our room was not reached by an elevator. We had to climb 3 flights up  It was a workout! It required some lifting with our luggage!

We stayed in a lovely room that was very clean, nicely decortaed and well equipped. Sat out on a terrace where there was also wifi access so I could do some work from there overlooking the rooftops and tree canopy. Staff was friendly and location was great. We only had one night and were able to explore a lot of Avignon on foot from the hotel. I would stay here again and recommend it to friends. Breakfast was ok, it was nice to sit out in the courtyard, but a little expensive for what it offers. Next time I might grab a croissant and coffee round the corner for half the price!

All was really fine. The room was somewhat small, but I think quite the norm for European standards (at the price). A/C was included, as was coffee, tea, hot water kettle, and fridge. No real complaints--nice view of the small inner courtyard.
Clean and nice upgrade. Close to Avignon Centre and everything else in town. No complaints
The room was spacious, comfortable, great bathroom and vibe.

The location is great, right on Ave Jean Jaurès near the train station and a straight line up to the Place de L'Horloge and the Palace of the Popes. 
Attached bar and charming courtyard No elevator, so if you have limited mobility it can be difficult.

Close to the papal palace. Clean, modern room and bathroom in a stone building with interesting architecture. Nice staff. Cafe downstairs. There is a nice patio on the roof with a view of the church next door The hotel does not have a parking. Street is closed to motor traffic. You have to park at a public parking
Great location—very close to train station and the sites, bars, and restaurants! The room was small, but very comfortable and quiet. A small refrigerator would be nice.

Very reasonable cost for the location just a couple blocks north of the station so walk because you can’t get a taxi there. 
It is central to every thing in old Avignon as the name suggests and it’s easy to pop out for a stroll around a few streets, then go back to the hotel to rest. It’s very comfortable with a little restaurant on the main floor with tables in the lobby or on the street so you can people watch. The staff are friendly and can help with travel issues. The breakfast buffet is very satisfying with good variety. The rooms are small and you have to use the staircase for some.

title: Garlande Hôtel Avignon Centre
description:
Featuring free WiFi, Garlande Hôtel Avignon Center offers accommodations set on a pedestrian street in Avignon, 1640 feet from Papal Palace and 2953 feet from Pont d'Avignon.

Each room is fitted with a flat-screen TV and a bath or shower. Certain rooms feature a seating area where you can relax.

Breakfast is available at the property for an additional charge. Evening meals can be served from Monday to Thursday if you reserve 24 hours in advance.

The property is a 10-minute walk from Avignon Central Station and Avignon - Caumont Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

top_reviews.review: Room size, in the center of Avignon but in a quiet location , friendliness of staff who speak French and English well.  Breakfast service was good.
The staff was great. The beds were very comfortable. We were two floors up, so it would have been convenient to have an elevator. However the staff carried our bags up for us so it  was okay.
Chargers by the bedsides, spacious bathroom, helped with reservations, very friendly, excellent location Nothing

The hotel was in a great location.  The gentleman who checked us in was very thorough about the building, its history, and how everything worked.  For such an old building it was beautifully kept and had modern amenities.  Though we did not take part in the hotel breakfast, i wish we had.  It looked like truly genuine French breakfast.

Clement, the housekeeping team and the owner were just amazing and welcoming. The property and room were super charming and comfortable. Lots of restaurants and bars nearby. Loved everything about this place, but be advised that if you have mobility issues ensure you get a first floor room (entry level) otherwise you need to carry your bag(s) and go up and down narrow winding stairs. For us that was charming but for others it could be difficult.
Very helpful professional staff. Very quiet. Attractive conveniently located All good
It was in the center of everything. Surrounded by shops, museums, restaurants and historical sites. Very narrow staircase. Challenging to navigate with suitcases.

Clement, the hotel manager was very helpful in getting us a room on the lower floor.  Room was recently remodeled, very nice!!  He also offered us his restaurant suggestions!!  EXCELLENT!!  Offered many suggestions on. 
directions to get to places. Nothing
Great location, very clean, lovely staff, delicious breakfast.
Friendly, welcoming staff.  Good buffet style breakfast.  Safe, locked bicycle storage in their garage.  Great location.

title: Hôtel Les Corps Saints
description:
Hôtel Les Corps Saints features a location facing Agricol Perdiguier Square in Avignon's historic city center, 5 minutes' walk from the train station. The rooms include free WiFi. Corps Saints Square is 262 feet from the hotel.

Only accessible by stairs, the rooms come with a TV and have a private bathroom with a shower.

For an additional fee, guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast with cheese, pastries, cold meat, jams, yogurt, boiled and hard boiled eggs. Another breakfast option called 'Bistrot' is available and includes fruit juices, unlimited hot drinks, croissants, fresh bread, jams and homemade butter. Restaurants can be found less than 328 feet away.

Papal Palace is a 10 minutes' walk away. Public parking is available nearby for an additional charge. Avignon TGV train station is 9.3 mi away.
property_highlights: Located in the heart of Avignon, this hotel has an excellent location score of 9.3
Want a great night's sleep? This hotel was highly-rated for its very comfy beds.

top_reviews.review: Nice area, great location, nice and helpful staff!
Amazing location, central to restaurants and shops yet very quiet, especially in the evening.

Good location, 10 minutes walk from central train station and restaurants/museums/palaces
Very clean apartment, amazing view from the window on the park area

The room was very clean, and it was quite large.  We thought it was well thought out - tables and lights on both sides of the bed, hooks for hanging towels in the bathroom, space around the sink to put toiletries down, etc.  It was a very nice room for the price we paid.

Location was great, a short walk to train or bus stations, restaurants nearby, as was the tourist office. Rooms were small, but comfortable. We actually stayed twice, first for 2 nights, then for 1 more later in our trip. Very nice people, helpful, and friendly. Did not try the breakfast on offer, we went out for walks and then got coffee along the way. Not crazy about the winding stairs, but found them everywhere we stayed. Just my own quirk.

the hotel was very good, we just stayed one night without breakfast, but was amazing thanks for the location.
Also, was clean they provided us with higiene care. was a little tricky to find the wc flush bottom, but we manage to found it 👍🏻

Small, pensione style hotel, next to a park and just off the main street to the train station. Easy walk to train, bus and all the town. Quiet area, very nice staff, OK to leave luggage if you need to. We stayed there twice, both rooms were small but quite adequate, suited our needs perfectly. Not really a negative, just be aware that there are steep spiral stairs.
Location is great. It is inside the city walls on a narrow side street. Probably 10 min walk from the papal palace. Bathroom has some of the equipment broken and in general needs upgrade.

The location was perfect - very close to Avignon central station and the center of the town. All the staff - Nawel, Rachid and Karim - were very efficient, helpful and pleasant. The bed was comfortable, and there was a kettle in the room too. It would have been better if the TV remote worked :):):)
Convenient location, easy walk from the train station.  The room was fine for a short solo stay. The staff have a fondness for ringing you on your telephone.  Like for everything.

title: La Saraillerie - PATIO - CLIM - WIFI
description:
La Saraillerie - PATIO - CLIM - WIFI is located in Avignon, just a 7-minute walk from Avignon Central Station and 3.1 miles from Avignon TGV Train Station. This apartment offers accommodations with a terrace and free Wifi. The property is 200 yards from the city center and a 6-minute walk from Papal Palace.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with an a bath or shower. A flat-screen TV is featured. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Avignon, like walking tours.

property_information:
Welcome to our apartments in the heart of Avignon!

All of our accommodations are located within the city’s ancient walls, just a short stroll from the Palais des Papes, the Pont d’Avignon, the Place de l’Horloge and the many theaters, museums and cafés that bring the city to life.

Some of our apartments are set within exceptional 17th and 18th-century mansions — former noble residences now listed as historic monuments. Staying there means experiencing the unique atmosphere of Avignon’s architectural heritage, with grand staircases, high ceilings, and timeless elegance.

Whether you’re here for culture, food or festivals, our homes are the perfect base for exploring the city on foot. We are Kathy & Saad, a French couple living near Avignon with our two children.
We love welcoming guests and helping them discover this beautiful region of Provence.

We are always happy to share recommendations for restaurants, walks and cultural visits. Whether you’re coming for a night or a week, we’ll do our best to make your stay simple, smooth and comfortable. See you soon in Avignon! Our apartments are located in the very heart of Avignon’s historic centre, a vibrant and walkable district filled with charm.

You’ll find everything within a short walking distance: the Palais des Papes, the Pont d’Avignon, the Place de l’Horloge, picturesque alleyways, and the famous covered market “Les Halles”, ideal for discovering local flavours.

The neighbourhood is full of cafés, bakeries, wine bars, and small restaurants — perfect for enjoying the Provençal lifestyle.

Whether you're here for a cultural break, a romantic weekend or a business trip, you’ll love being able to explore everything on foot, from sunrise to evening strolls by the ramparts.

The hosts answered questions and flexed with our needs for a slightly early arrival.  It was a couple of flights of stairs up, so if you aren't able to climb/carry your luggage then you should not stay here.
It has a great location in the old part of the city. Easy walk to restaurants and the Papal Palace. All was good.

We loved it! Great location, well-appointed kitchen, quite clean and comfortable, very helpful and attentive staff. The stairs are a bit narrow and steep. This was not a problem for us, but it's worth noting for travelers who may have mobility issues.

The apartment was well equipped, central and spotless.  Stephanie gave very very clear directions about how to enter the apartment as well as helpful suggestions I Wouk have appreciated some very few staples such as salt and pepper and olive oil
Great location. Nice room. Stephanie (landlady) is very pleasant.

Inside the wall close to everything and access to parking nearby outside the wall. It was a little extra effort to get in because I was originally given the wrong code, but the gave us the right code quickly when we contacted them.

It is located within the walls of Avignon & therefore, within easy walking distance of all the sights. Stephanie was very helpful with instructions for clothes washing as well as booking us a taxi. Although there is a bar close by, it did not bother us during the night. Our apartment was on the second floor and the stairs were a little narrow but nothing we could not handle.  We had a double bed under a bunk bed & would have preferred a separate double bed with a bedside table. However, we found the bed very comfortable.

property_information:
Welcome here !

Our studios are perfectly suited for short stays, even for professionals : all the consumables are already on site, which avoids unnecessary loading (pods of coffee, tea, sugar, salt, pepper, oil, toothpaste , shower products ...).

We put a point of honor on cleanliness: it certainly increases the cost of cleaning, but it is the only way to maintain a perfect state of cleanliness of the premises, and also, to offer a decent salary to our employees!

Finally, we can also enjoy a fairly modern setting, with quality and personalized furnishings: we took care of all the home-staging ourselves and have followed all our sites so that the finishes are as aesthetic as possible , All for the pleasure of your eyes, and we hope you enjoy! We are passionate about the heritage of Avignon and its surroundings, we take great care to make our studios the ideal place for short stays from 1 night to a week to visit the region, or even to a stay in the professional setting.

To make you benefit from our knowledge of the region, and to help you as much as possible in the organization of your stay, we will send you by email our good addresses as well as practical info on car parks, sightseeing ideas and many more !
We also remain very available if you need personalized advice. All our apartments are located in the heart of the city, and in the most exclusive neighborhoods. You will not be disappointed with the location !

title: L'Oriflamme
description:
L'Oriflamme is an apartment featuring rooms with free Wifi and air conditioning in the center of Avignon. The property is around 3.6 miles from Avignon TGV Train Station, 7 miles from Parc des Expositions Avignon, and 26 miles from Arles Amphitheatre. Guests can access the apartment via private entrance.

All units are equipped with a terrace or a balcony, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, DVD player, a well-equipped kitchen, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave, and toaster are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units have bed linen and towels.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Avignon, like hiking.

Popular points of interest near L'Oriflamme include Papal Palace, Avignon Central Station, and Pont d'Avignon.

top_reviews.review:
The hosts were wonderful and actually met us at the door.  They provided clear instructions, and were always available if needed.

The room was very clean and in a perfect location to explore Avignon.

Thomas is a great host, greeting us when we arrive and giving lots of information about parking and surrounding highlights. The studio has everything you need. The USB slots by bedside is really convenient. Good location, easy to shop and walk around. Hope the bed can be bigger. The kitchen light seems not working.
Everything was perfect. Very clean and comfortable, great location. Especially the host Thomas is so kind and helpful, he came to pick us up at the bus stop. I really recommend. Nothing

The little studio is cute and modern.; It is in an old building and they kept a carving on the wall . It gave a sense of old days  in history in Avignon. I think the outside of the building could be marked  a little more visible for people from other countries .
Very close to all amenities. Incredibly clean and well furnished. Wonderful hosts who provided lots of information pre-trip and answered any questions immediately. Nothing - it was brilliant!

Central location. Comfortable bed. Very clean. Easy to communicate with the host. Free public parking available outside of the town  with short ride on the  free bus then 2 minute walk from the bus. Nice bakery right on the corner, lots of restaurants around. Safe and secure. Vibrant area of town. It would be little difficult to get large suitcases up the narrow stairs if someone had large suitcases, that wasn’t our case.

Wonderful little place with everything you need for a stop over in Avignon.  Very close to all the historic places of interest, easy to find car park and great communication from the host! Thank you so much! 😀 Nothing
Large comfortable room. Every detail has been thought of for the comfort of the traveler.

- Good location
- Spacious room
- Friendly host who came to greet us - Slightly bit of noise from outside and upstairs but not a big issue

Fantastic location, darling apartment, clean, all amenities you could need including a hair dryer!  Close to the gate to get to free parking at Italiens parking lot. Absolutely nothing. It’s wonderful.

property_information:
Want a super clean accommodation? We fully disinfect after each traveler.

And you want a comfortable flat ? There's A/C, Wifi, ,coffee maker Senseo and all what you need in each flat

Don't want to waste time during your stay? We are 5 minutes walking distance from the Palais des Papes and bridge, 100 meters from the  bus stops of free cityzen shuttle (from free parking des Italiens) and Baladine (from center station), and with all the amenities nearby (grocery store, bakery, etc.)

Need advice for your stay? Once you'll book, we will send you our selection of sightseeing spots, restaurants and unmissable activities inside and around the city.

Want more ? !! With our experience of the countryside, we organize your personalized tours : wine, villages, biking, MTB, hiking ... Everything is possible. Contact us to adapt your wishes to your budget.

Are you still hesitating? Read the 250 comments made by our travellers as Rebecca: "What a great experience. Easy check-in, friendly host, super easy communication, and clean apartment with a great view. We loved the location and wished we were staying longer. Highly recommend !"

So book now and see you soon. Ideal for couples, families or business travelers, our accommodations  with “Accueil Vélo” label will drive you to the historical streets of Avignon city cente, :
- 1st floor : 3 persons studio
- 2nd floor : 4 persons studio, king size bed
- 3rd floor : 4 persons duplex, 2 bedrooms, 3 beds, balcony with view on the Palace

title: Les Précieuses Suites & Spa II
description:
A 8-minute walk from Papal Palace in the center of Avignon, Les Précieuses Suites & Spa II offers accommodations with access to spa facilities. The air-conditioned accommodation is a 10-minute walk from Avignon Central Station. The accommodation provides a hot tub, free Wifi throughout the property, and a 24-hour front desk.

Providing garden views, this apartment also offers a cable flat-screen TV, a well-equipped kitchenette with a microwave, a fridge, and a stovetop, as well as 1 bathroom with a hot tub and a hair dryer. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Avignon, like fishing and walking tours.

Avignon TGV Train Station is 2.8 miles from Les Précieuses Suites & Spa II, while Parc des Expositions Avignon is 7.6 miles away.

top_reviews.review: Loved the location - close enough to everything but on a charming, quiet block. Communication with the host was easy. The apartment had everything we needed. I would recommend!! N/A

Great location inside the wall! The apartment has a key pad for the outside door and a key box in the entry hall for the apartment key. The apartment is very clean, the bed was super comfortable and the decor is pretty. I enjoyed the jacuzzi soaker tub! 
The apartment is located in a quiet residential area and there is the ability to unload your car in front if you drove. Parking on the street is free on Sundays as well as between 7pm and 9 am. The Palace garage is only €19.40 for 24 hours. 
    Mica was a very attentive host, reaching out to welcome us, answering all of my questions and even provided restaurant suggestions! He was just so nice. 
    My husband and I would definitely stay here again. Nothing
Located in a quiet residential neighborhood but close to everything. The room is very beautiful, with everything you need. The bathtub is fancy. AC works very well in a heat wave. None
Very good location, a quiet street very close to the city center. Very clean. Convenient check-in and check-out. And a real bathtub with a jacuzzi. Highly recommended.

Location was very good. Neighborhood seemed safe. It was quiet. The kitchenette was very good. Bed was not very comfortable. No tissues or lotion in the bathroom. Would have liked to have some shelves in the room. Milk for tea or coffee
The location inside the city wall area was great. The bed was comfortable. The kitchen area was nice. We enjoyed the whirlpool bath. The apartment was clean and our host was super. No problems.
Very close to the center of avignon. Nice 5-8 minute walk

Perfectly located in the old city center, within walking distance of all tourist attractions. The apartment is small, but squeaky clean, with a working jacuzzi tub. The communication and check in went smoothly, and staff are very helpful. Bonus points for free parking 10 mins away over the river. -
It had a great location to explore the area and was very clean, the spa bath was fun

Proximity to city centre, quiet location, clean.

Michael keeping us regularly informed in some ways compensated for lack of onsite reception. Very steep stairs to first floor and lack of landing area in front of the door.
Lack of shower, spa bath difficult to access.
Lack of room safe

title: Le Vieux Sextier - AC Clim - Lumineux - WIFI - Hypercentre
description:
Le Vieux Sextier - AC Clim - Lumineux - WIFI - Hypercentre offers accommodations in Avignon, a 9-minute walk from Avignon Central Station and 3.1 miles from Avignon TGV Train Station. Featuring city views, this apartment also features free Wifi. The property is a few steps from the city center and a 7-minute walk from Papal Palace.

This apartment includes 3 bedrooms, a living room and a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dining area, and 2 bathrooms with a walk-in shower and a washing machine. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. There's also a seating area and a fireplace.

There is an on-site coffee shop.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Avignon, like walking tours.

Parc des Expositions Avignon is 7 miles from Le Vieux Sextier - AC Clim - Lumineux - WIFI - Hypercentre, while Arles Amphitheatre is 25 miles from the property.

availability.bed_configuration: Bedroom 1: 1 queen bed Bedroom 2: 1 queen bed Bedroom 3: 1 queen bed

top_reviews.review: Location in old city. Everything was walking distance away and/or close to a bus line.  Apt itself was a spacious , bright, remains of some old baptistery apt, that has been updated with modern amenities.The hosts were helpful and had good recommendations. I suggest installing a shower curtain in the master bath and having 1-2 fans in the apt especially master bedroom that doesn’t have an air conditioner.

Great location and a vary large apartment for a family of 5. Feels like a royal apartment. The high ceilings and large rooms are great. Beds were comfortable. There is indeed some street noise that is audible at night from at least one of the rooms. We went in knowing this and brought ear plugs to help. One of the bathrooms has only a tub and sprayer and not a shower.

The building is a style old building. The best and nicest in Avignon. The apartment was huge and comfortable for six of us. No elevator, but the staircase is comfortable. The air condition wasn't too good it was noisy and not enough and one of the windows not operated  because the air condition machine equipment was in front of there. Thi s was a cheap thing. The others is a ok.
It felt quite grand, charming, and so spacious!  My kids loved the place and so did my husband. I felt like I was a queen in the master bedroom.

This place is not just spacious, with its 5m ceilings and 36sqm bedroom, it’s palatial. It’s also hard to imagine a better location, very central but far enough away from the brouhaha. The only disappointment was that we had intended to stay 6 nights which was cut short to 3 as I had issues with my credit card. Florent was a great help trying to relocate us but honestly, La Vieux Sextier is a very hard act to follow. Furnishings don’t go much beyond the essentials but that’s nit-picking. Nothing
מיקום מושלם, בית נפלא שלא חסר כלום , כל הפסיליטי מושלם , קרוב לברים ומסעדות , חניה מאוד קרובה לרכב במחיר משתלם פשוט מושלם רק את המדרגות
La ubicación era perfecta y la casa como un palacio

Огромные апартаменты в историческом здании, большие комнаты, высокие потолки с лепниной, изумительной красоты камины и антикварные бронзовые люстры в каждой комнате. Стильная современная мебель. Чистота. 
Пожалуй, лучшее расположение - в самом центре исторического города, но на небольшой улице, где  нет толп туристов.
Для нашей семьи с тремя детьми апартаменты были идеальными! В самой большой спальне по утрам было шумно - похоже, работали городские службы (мыли улицу?). В этой комнате лучше спать тем, кто рано встает. В других трех комнатах с видом во двор было тихо. 

Еще надо учитывать, что нет лифта - но для нас это не было проблемой. Поднимались по красивой старинннц лестнице.
La casa è grandissima, davvero stupenda e ben arredata. Non avevo mai affittato un appartamento così grande e così centrale, davvero il top.
Todo. Ubicación genial, el apartamento espectacular, muy cómodo.
